derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from sorser (from Old French sorcier, based on Latin sors, sort- 'lot') + -er

entry.def: In fairy stories, a sorcerer is a person who performs magic by using the power of evil spirits.

means.word_mean: 1. one who practices magic or sorcery
